info.name: Doc API - Cine
info.description:
# Introduction
Documentation that aims at the correct use of the API.

# Overview
This documentation displays all possible requests and responses within the API.

# Authentication
You do not need to use authentication to make requests to this API.

# Error Codes
** 400 – Bad Request **
Data sent incorrectly or non-standard

** 405 - Method Not Allowed **
Some request parameters have not been entered

** 500 - Internal Server Error **
Error between server and database

item.name: User

request.description: Verify login user
Register a new user on the system
Shows a list with all system user.

variable.description: identify the user with that address

request.description: Search for a user with this id

variable.description: identify the user with that address

request.description: Update a user on the system

variable.description: identify the user with that address

request.description: Update a user's password and email in the system

variable.description: identify the user with that address

request.description: Remove a user on the system

item.name: Cine

request.description: Register a new cine on the system
Shows a list with all system cine.

response.name: List cines
